experience.title: Board Member
experience.description: Got reelected for two new years at SOS Children's Villages, with our main goal still ensuring that many more children succeed in life. SOS Children's Villages is a politically and religiously independent organization and works in accordance with the UN Convention on the Rights of the Child. SOS Children's Villages' main task is to work to ensure that all children grow up in a caring family. SOS Children's Villages works both internationally and in Norway.Distribution of the income 86 per cent of the income goes to the purpose and 1 per cent to administration and 13 per cent to obtain new funds.The board of SOS Children's Villages in Norway is, in addition to being responsible for the foundation's operation and management of funds, an important supporter of the organisation.
experience.description_html: Got reelected for two new years at SOS Children's Villages, with our main goal still ensuring that many more children succeed in life. SOS Children's Villages is a politically and religiously independent organization and works in accordance with the UN Convention on the Rights of the Child. SOS Children's Villages works both internationally and in Norway.Distribution of the income 86 per cent of the income goes to the purpose and 1 per cent to administration and 13 per cent to obtain new funds.The board of SOS Children's Villages in Norway is, in addition to being responsible for the foundation's operation and management of funds, an important supporter of the organisation.

experience.title: Partner, Antler Capital
experience.description: I am part of the Antler leadership, working with global fundraising as a partner in Antler Capital, giving investors the opportunity to gain exposure to a wide range of early-stage startups across most major startup hubs globally. Antler is a global early-stage venture capital firm that invests in the defining technology companies of tomorrow. Antler is the investor backing the world’s most driven founders, from day zero to greatness.Founded on the belief that people innovating is the key to building a better future, Antler partners with exceptional founders across six continents to launch and scale startups that address meaningful opportunities and challenges.Knowing that exceptional founders can come from anywhere with any background, we have offices in 25 cities across six continents, including Austin, New York, London, Berlin, Stockholm, Bangalore, Jakarta, Singapore, Seoul, Tokyo, and Sydney.Our global community of builders, investors, operators, experts, and partner organizations backs people from the very start of their founder journey—pre-team or even pre-idea. Since 2018, we have helped create and invested in more than 600 startups across a wide range of industries and technologies, with the goal of backing more than 6,000 by 2030.A better future will not happen automatically—the world needs determined, ambitious, and resilient founders to build it. We are committed to supporting them and pursuing our vision of making progress inevitable.

positions.subtitle: Arctic Securities
positions.description: Built strong client relationships, in particular between Norwegian and international companies across  products and industries – example relationships and mandates include Aker Group (M&A and capital raisings), a range of Brazilian companies (M&A, DCM and worked on a Brazilian IPO), USPP, Chinese conglomerates (restructuring and strategic discussions), Japanese companies (capital raise, M&A and partnerships).
positions.title: Corporate Finance Partner
positions.description_html: Built strong client relationships, in particular between Norwegian and international companies across products and industries – example relationships and mandates include Aker Group (M&A and capital raisings), a range of Brazilian companies (M&A, DCM and worked on a Brazilian IPO), USPP, Chinese conglomerates (restructuring and strategic discussions), Japanese companies (capital raise, M&A and partnerships). <!---->

positions.subtitle: Arctic Securities
positions.description: Initiated the discussions regarding the start-up of Arctic Brasil on the back of several strong local relationships with  key players in the E&P, oil service and offshore sectors (Arctic’s first office outside of Oslo) Set up all business activities and new functions of Arctic Brasil, and created processes for business planning, hiring, regulatory filings, legal compliance, reporting structures etc. Managed internal and external stakeholders and reported directly to top management in Oslo through bi-weekly reports and conference  calls, as well as quarterly reports and presentations to the Board of Directors of Arctic Securities Originated and managed deals leveraging the full Arctic Securities franchise across products, capabilities and people in complex cross-border transactions, such as the buy-side from DOF Norskan for a consortium of Brazilian Private Equity players, Mare Investimentos and Mantiq  Investimentos, new bond issues (DCM) as well as finding partners (owners / JVs) for Norwegian / International companies in Brazil
positions.title: Executive Chairman Arctic Brasil
positions.description_html:
Initiated the discussions regarding the start-up of Arctic Brasil on the back of several strong local relationships with key players in the E&P, oil service and offshore sectors (Arctic’s first office outside of Oslo)
Set up all business activities and new functions of Arctic Brasil, and created processes for business planning, hiring, regulatory filings, legal compliance, reporting structures etc.
Managed internal and external stakeholders and reported directly to top management in Oslo through bi-weekly reports and conference calls, as well as quarterly reports and presentations to the Board of Directors of Arctic Securities
Originated and managed deals leveraging the full Arctic Securities franchise across products, capabilities and people in complex cross-border transactions, such as the buy-side from DOF Norskan for a consortium of Brazilian Private Equity players, Mare Investimentos and Mantiq Investimentos, new bond issues (DCM) as well as finding partners (owners / JVs) for Norwegian / International companies in Brazil

positions.subtitle: Arctic Securities
positions.description: Specialised in international project finance and industries such as drilling, offshore and oil services (travelled to Brazil 8-10 times prior to  relocating to Rio, and had established an extensive network before relocating)

experience.title: Trainee
experience.description: SAS Scandinavian Airlines, MilanTrainee in the Marketing Department working directly below the Sales and Marketing ManagerMain task was to improve the Italian version of www.scandinavian.net  and benchmark towards other airlines web sites. Another task was to enhance the relationship between SAS and the respective Scandinavian Tourist BoardsWorked full time during vacations, and part time whilst attending my third year at Bocconi University. Office language was Italian4
